entry.title: Hello friends!
entry.content:
Welcome to my blogâ€œé›’æ²³æ¡¥å— â€! Iâ€™ll share some interesting things here, thanks to GitHub for giving me this platform before that!

Iâ€™m still a novice for building websites.

For programming, I havenâ€™t learned any programming language other than C.

So to build a successful blog site, I also have to thank all the open source bigwigs!

Theme: blinkfoxé—ªçƒä¹‹ç‹ Hexo theme

I may have to stop updating for a while after this.

However, I would say that setting up a personal blog website is by no means a whim on my part.

I'll update the blog when I'm done with the things at hand.

hexo-script-win: hexo-scriptä½¿ç”¨æ–‡æ¡£ (gitbook.io)

Itâ€™s still necessary to summarize the process of setting up a blog and say goodbye.
